text:
The Iconic park and Impressive more architecture and very beautiful garden. A must see if you visit Singapore.
While most of the Gardens by the Bay can be enjoyed for free, certain attractions do come with an entry fee.

The Gardens by the Bay is easily accessible by public transportation. If you are taking Singaporeâ€™s efficient MRT, get off at the Bayfront MRT station, and the Gardens is just a short walk away. You can also take a taxi or a bus to the Gardens.

The best time to visit the Gardens would be in the mornings or in the evening to night and on weekdays. You can rent bicycle to explore MBS Garden Park or just walking around.

Marina bay sand garden park, One of the best place that i had ever been to in my life. A must see if you're in singapore. Impressive more architecture and very Beautiful garden. A national garden and premier horticultural attraction for local and international visitors, Gardens by the Bay is a showpiece of horticulture and garden artistry that presents the plant kingdom in a whole new way, entertaining while educating visitors with plants seldom seen in this part of the world. Awesome view all around here. It's really great at night.

Cool park that is free for those of us who wants to experience Marina Bay sands without having the budget to go see cloud forest which would be 50 SGPz . There is so much to see and experience just by walking around the park! The view was amazing. The weather was breezy and humid. This iconic view of Singapore is a must
Amazing free experience. A must when in Singapore. Just be prepared for long waits for Taxiâ€™s/Grabs post show.
